data.label: HardCoder
data.description: Hardcoder 是一套 Android APP 与系统间的通信解决方案，突破了 APP 只能调用系统标准 API，无法直接调用系统底层硬件资源的问题，让 Android APP 和系统能实时通信。APP 能充分调度系统资源如 CPU 频率，大小核，GPU 频率等来提升 APP 性能，系统能够从 APP 侧获取更多信息以便更合理提供各项系统资源。同时，对于 Android 缺乏标准接口实现的功能，APP 和系统也可以通过该框架实现机型适配和功能拓展。

data.label: HardCoder
data.description: Hardcoder is a communication solution between Android apps and the system, breaking through the problem that apps can only call system standard APIs and cannot directly call system underlying hardware resources, allowing Android apps and systems to communicate in real-time. Apps can fully schedule system resources such as CPU frequency, big and little cores, GPU frequency, etc., to improve app performance, and the system can obtain more information from the app side to provide various system resources more reasonably. Meanwhile, for functions lacking standard interface implementation in Android, apps and systems can also achieve model adaptation and function expansion through this framework.
